channel.title: Photoshop help!
channel.description:
Okay guys I have been trying to create a photoshop image with a transparent background so I can place the text in-game. But whenever I choose 'transparent' when I click on File>New. This is what happens: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/zuo9k7.jpg[/img] But look at this, these are transparent(I didn't make them): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/r2vkhu.png[/img]
Could somebody please help me?

item.title: Photoshop help!
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:2, topic:464704”]Wrong section. There is a section specifically for help.[/quote]My bad, I solved it anyway. I was forgetting to Flatten the image.

Read full topic
